name: Toffoli Gate (CCNOT)
description: Implement the quantum Toffoli gate using classical reversible operations. Toffoli(a,b,c) flips c if both a and b are 1. This is a universal reversible gate!

hints.text: Toffoli flips the target bit c if both control bits a and b are 1
First compute a AND b into temp (temp must start at 0)
Then XOR c with temp to conditionally flip c
Don't forget to uncompute temp back to 0 for full reversibility!
